definition: The Wealth of Nations (1776) by Adam Smith 亞當·斯密|亚当·斯密[Ya4 dang1 · Si1 mi4]
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: The Wealth of Nations built the frame of modern economic theory.
sentences.chinese: 《國富論》建構了現代經濟理論的框架。

sentences.english: in his book Wealth of Nations.
sentences.chinese: 寫在他的著作《國富論》中。
